programme.title: Day of Anger
programme.desc: Bank robbery pulled off by the bank officials, not the usual James gang.

programme.title: A Coffin from Sartana
programme.desc: After witnessing a brutal massacre, the legendary hero Sartana is ready to do some investigating. Almost everyone in the tiny town of Indian Creek seems eager to buy up the property left behind by the murder victims, ...

programme.title: If you meet Sartana... Pray for your Death
programme.desc: Crooked bankers plan an insurance swindle and hire a Mexican gang to steal the bank's gold but they also pay Lasky's gang to kill the Mexicans.

programme.title: God is my Colt
programme.desc: A Army agent goes undercover to clean up corrupt Langford City full of Mexican outlaws.

programme.title: Ben and Charlie
programme.desc: Two likable bandits try to make a living in the Old West.

programme.title: Fifteen Scaffolds for a Murderer
programme.desc: Accused of a hideous crime they did not commit, the members of two rivaling gangs, persecuted by a bloodthirsty lynch mob, take refuge in an abandoned fort, taking two hostages with them.

programme.title: Adiós Gringo
programme.desc: A gunslinger on the run for a murder he didn't commit goes to New Mexico where he hopes to find a person who can exculpate him. While on his way he finds a girl who has been kidnapped and tortured, sets her free and then takes his revenge at gunpoint.

programme.title: Heads or Tails
programme.desc: Shanda is charged with the murder of the banker, Burton and to save her from being lynched, the sheriff sends her off to Phoenix. During the trip the two deputies to whom she’s been entrusted rape and leave her in the desert, certain that she’s dead. The girl is found by Black Talisman, an outlaw, who takes her to his hideout, nurses her back to health and after hearing her story, determines to avenge her and clear her name.

programme.title: Fighters from Ave Maria
programme.desc: Western spaghetti set in gold rush times in California, involving circus acrobats, outlaws and a gold mine.

programme.title: Damned Pistols of Dallas
programme.desc: Outlaw Fast Draw (Álvarez) assaults stagecoach with passengers Clay Stone (Beir), singer Katy Dior (Marandi) and gambler Fred Foster (Mathot), but Stone is ready to take revenge.

programme.title: Tequila
programme.desc: Tequila and Bobo hit the little town of Chedron intending to rob the local bank whose owner, De Koven, is trying to freeze out all the ranchers in the area by the simple expedient of foreclosing on the mortgages his bank holds on their land.

programme.title: Four Gunmen of the Holy Trinity
programme.desc: Arms trafficking with the Indians on the one hand and acquiring documents concerning the ownership of a goldmine on the other are the principal interests of Quin and Gomez, the highly suspicious guests at Papa Martinez' inn.

programme.title: Brother Outlaw
programme.desc: A man is falsely charged with bank robbery, prompting his brother to break him out of prison.

programme.title: El Rojo
programme.desc: The Sorenson family is massacred, apparently by Indians. On the site of the killing, a town, Gold Hill grows up, run by a group of businessmen.

programme.title: Django Meets Sartana
programme.desc: The small desert town of Black City is held in a reign of terror by a nasty gang of criminals lead by the ruthless Bud Willer.
